column2: "So this is the Tundra. Yup, everything's frozen solid, just like they said it would be."
"But why would a planet have a frozen wasteland like this right next to a lush, green paradise?"
"It's kind of weird. A little creepy, if you ask me. I mean..."
"Oh, whatever. We've got a mission to focus on. Those De Malmoths had better watch out, huh?"
